## Description {#details}

This file contains the declarations of the HTTPServer and HTTPServerRequest classes, the HTTPResponse, and StreamingHTTPResponse structs, and the streamFile function.

<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Registers a URL pattern routing rule. When the server is listening, each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// request is dispatched to the first registered handler whose UrlPathPattern</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// matches the UrlPath.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/httpserver/#a57df1a0b2431ed4c6afb10acfb6108d1">get</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> UrlPathPattern, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a484725ce6bbff0f1751423cac5f22370">HTTPRequestHandler</a> Handler);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Attempts to assign the requested port and interface, returning an Error</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// upon failure.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/httpserver/#a71ab0a18a93070081e4d5570088dc812">bind</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Port, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;HostInterface = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;0.0.0.0&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Attempts to assign any available port and interface, returning either the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// port number or an Error upon failure.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/httpserver/#a71ab0a18a93070081e4d5570088dc812">bind</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;HostInterface = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;0.0.0.0&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Attempts to listen for requests on the bound port. Returns an Error if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// called before binding a port.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/httpserver/#a98e1c84406f4cfcae0f250846f16c427">listen</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If the server is listening, stop and unbind the socket.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/httpserver/#ad6cdeb6e8e3440309d30d2618fcbd7f7">stop</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LLVM&#95;DEBUGINFOD&#95;HTTPSERVER&#95;H</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
